subject: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend some cash
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire TODAY):
$277,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://storeasupsmore.com/
